name: paired_t_test_from_database
description: Perform a paired t-test on two numeric columns from a SQLite database table or query.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause, such as table name or JOIN expression.

x_col.description: The name of the first numeric column.

y_col.description: The name of the second numeric column.

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (excluding the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: List of parameter values to substitute into the WHERE clause.

drop_na.description: Whether to drop rows with NA values before testing.

show_summary_stats.description: Whether to return group summary statistics (mean, std, n).
